topic.title: Design Review approval of Preliminary Landscape Design Plan

body.p: A Preliminary Landscape Design Plan shall be provided. The Preliminary Plan shall contain the information as described in Chapter 2.0 of this document, to be reviewed by the City's Design Review Committee (DRC) for compliance with the landscape design criteria contained in this document, in addition to the design standards and guidelines as set forth in any other applicable document. The City's Design Review process represents the basis for approval or denial of a design proposal, and no grading, building or use permit can be issued until a project has received approval from the DRC. Decisions .of the DRC are appealable to the City's Planning Commission, whose decisions may in turn be appealed to the City Council.
